ValidationRule.description: Enforce the allowable number of binders of 5 or 10 or more binders - exclude quantities of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 or 9. Null, 5 and >= 10 are OK for Binder_Quantity__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type"), ( (Binder_Quantity__c >= 0) && (Binder_Quantity__c <= 4) ) || ( (Binder_Quantity__c >= 6) && (Binder_Quantity__c <= 9) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you select Binder Quantity, the acceptable values are 5 or 10 or more binders.
